title: Pandemic Research Fund
description: To support research on pandemics, such as COVID-19, in order to provide data for timely and novel responses. Support includes, but is not limited to, biobanks and clinical trials at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To support research on pandemics, such as COVID-19, in order to provide data for timely and novel responses. Support includes, but is not limited to, biobanks and clinical trials at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
